plays.text: Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Hooking Dainius Zubrus
Goal scored by Jason Doig assisted by Steve Konowalchuk and Jeff Halpern
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Roughing Tomas Kurka
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jason Doig
Penalty to Bret Hedican 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for High Sticking Peter Bondra
Penalty to Steve Konowalchuk 2 minutes for Elbowing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Tripping Craig Adams
Penalty to Bruno St. Jacques 2 minutes for Holding Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Glen Wesley 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Dainius Zubrus assisted by Peter Bondra and Michael Nylander
